channel.title: CVE Feed for FireEye -- FireEye HXTool
channel.description: The latest CVEs for FireEye -- FireEye HXTool

item.title: CVE-2024-0319|2024-08-30T19:04:52.774Z -- fireeye -- fireeye%20hxtool
item.description: Open Redirect vulnerability in FireEye HXTool affecting version 4.6, the exploitation of which could allow an attacker to redirect a legitimate user to a malicious page by changing the 'redirect_uri' parameter.
